-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Examples for the reactive-banana library, using wxHaskell.
--   
--   This library provides some GUI examples for the
--   <tt>reactive-banana</tt> library, using wxHaskell.
@package reactive-banana-wx
@version 0.4.0.0

module Reactive.Banana.WX

-- | Event with exactly one parameter.
event1 :: Typeable a => w -> Event w (a -> IO ()) -> NetworkDescription (Event a)

-- | Event without parameters.
event0 :: w -> Event w (IO ()) -> NetworkDescription (Event ())

-- | Behavior form an attribute
behavior :: w -> Attr w a -> NetworkDescription (Behavior a)
data Prop' w
(:==) :: (Attr w a) -> Discrete a -> Prop' w

-- | <a>Animate</a> a property with a stream of events
sink :: w -> [Prop' w] -> NetworkDescription ()
